mapper.insert: insert into store (store_seq, store_name, store_address, store_phone, hot_taste, sour_taste, clean_taste, sweet_taste, fresh_taste, k_hot_taste, store_latitude, store_longitude, store_category) values(store_seq.nextval, #{store_name}, #{store_address}, #{store_phone}, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, #{store_latitude}, #{store_longitude},#{store_category})
mapper.update: MERGE INTO BLOG b USING dual on (b.URL = #{url} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET b.STORE_PHONE = #{store_phone} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (b.URL,b.BLOG_NUMBER,b.OLD_ADDRESS,b.NEW_ADDRESS,b.RANK_SCORE,b.STORE_SEQ,b.description,b.store_phone,b.title,b.log_time) values (#{url}, #{blog_number}, #{old_address}, #{new_address}, #{rank_score}, #{store_seq},#{description},#{store_phone},#{title},#{log_time})
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO BLOG_RANK br USING dual on (br.URL = #{url} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET br.COMMENT_COUNT = #{comment_count} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN insert (URL, BLOG_WRITER_ID, COMMENT_COUNT, BODY_LENTH,IMAGE_COUNT) values(#{url},#{blog_writer_id},#{comment_count},#{body_lenth},#{image_count})

INSERT ALL
INTO BLOG_IMAGE(URL, IMAGE_URL) VALUES (#{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: select b.URL, b.BLOG_NUMBER, b.RANK_SCORE, b.STORE_PHONE, b.DESCRIPTION, br.BLOG_WRITER_ID, b.TITLE, b.log_time from blog b, blog_rank br where b.URL=br.URL and b.STORE_SEQ = #{storeSeq} order by b.RANK_SCORE desc
